products.name: Premium Leather Jacket
products.description: Luxurious premium leather jacket with a modern cut and exceptional craftsmanship. Features multiple pockets and a soft inner lining for comfort.

products.name: Smart Watch Pro
products.description: Feature-packed smartwatch with health monitoring, notifications, and a 3-day battery life. Water-resistant and comes with multiple band options.

products.name: Minimalist Table Lamp
products.description: Elegant minimalist table lamp with adjustable brightness. Perfect for your bedside table or desk, providing a warm, comfortable light.

products.name: Organic Face Serum
products.description: All-natural face serum with vitamin C and hyaluronic acid. Brightens skin, reduces fine lines, and provides deep hydration.

products.name: Designer Sunglasses
products.description: Stylish designer sunglasses with UV protection. These lightweight frames feature polarized lenses and come with a protective case.

products.name: Wireless Earbuds
products.description: High-fidelity wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and a comfortable fit. Includes multiple ear tip sizes and a charging case.

products.name: Scented Candle Set
products.description: Set of three premium scented candles made from natural soy wax. Long-burning with soothing fragrances to create a relaxing atmosphere.

products.name: Premium Skincare Kit
products.description: Complete skincare set with cleanser, toner, moisturizer, and serum. Formulated for all skin types with natural, gentle ingredients.

products.name: Casual Sneakers
products.description: Comfortable casual sneakers with memory foam insoles and breathable fabric. Perfect for everyday wear with excellent arch support.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with rich sound and deep bass. Waterproof design with 12-hour battery life, perfect for outdoor use.

products.name: Decorative Throw Pillows
products.description: Set of two elegant throw pillows with removable covers. Made from high-quality fabric with a hidden zipper for easy cleaning.

products.name: Natural Hair Care Set
products.description: Complete hair care set with shampoo, conditioner, and hair mask. Made with organic ingredients to nourish and strengthen all hair types.
